channel.title: Pages on Alexandre Mulatinho Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Alexandre Mulatinho Blog

item.title: Software
item.description:
Below, you’ll find a collection of projects I’ve developed, each tailored to solve specific problems or explore particular areas of programming. All of these projects are hosted on GitHub. The purpose of listing them here is to introduce you to these tools and invite you to explore, use, or even contribute to their development.

If you’re interested in learning more or getting involved, simply click on the links provided. Your feedback, contributions, and ideas are always welcome.

item.title: Welcome to my place!
item.description:
Hi, I’m Alexandre Mulatinho

DevOps | Site Reliability Engineer | Software Engineer

Linux | Kubernetes | Network Security

About Me

Highly skilled DevOps and Site Reliability Engineer with over a decade of experience in Linux, networking and system troubleshooting; mor than six years of experience in cloud architecture and automation. Proficient in managing cloud-based infrastructures, optimizing CI/CD pipelines, and ensuring high availability. Passionate about solving complex challenges and continuously learning in the tech space.

item.title: Docs
item.description:
Fique a vontade para baixar os arquivos e se desejar usá-los para suas próprias apresentações e artigos bastando apenas preservar o nome do autor original, aqui eu listo artigos escritos neste blog, pdf’s de artigos mais técnicos e algumas apresentações em eventos que participei. Espero que veja algo de útil para você :-)

Artigos Técnicos

  • Guia basico do LTSP (nao jogue seu antigo computador no lixo)
  • Utilizando storages com fitas DAT no linux
  • Alta disponibilidade com drbd e heartbeat

WebLog / Outros
